citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11: 45am on
11-Jan-17. A facility employee was contacted upon arrival. The employee indicated that the owner was away from
the facility and would not be returning for several days.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by standard mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11: 45am on
11-Jan-17.  A facility employee was contacted upon arrival.  The employee indicated that the owner was away from
the facility and would not be returning for several days.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by standard mail.
